title: Progression
text:
LetSbe an infinite sequence of integers:S0=a;S1=b;Si= |Si-2- Si-1| for all i ≥ 2.You have two integersaandb.You must answer some queries about the n-th element in the sequenceInputThe first line containsaandb(0 ≤a,b≤ 1018).The second line contains a integerq(1 ≤q≤ 100000).The third containsqintegersqi.OutputFor eachqiyou must print a line with the qi-th element ofS.ExampleInput:21 12
5
0 1 2 3 4Output:21
12
9
3
6Note: the values of qiare in the range of 64 bits.
